mapper.insert: insert into data_receive( userid, username, orgid, meter_code, counter_num, from_time, to_time, qrcode_url, data ) values ( #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{meterCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{counterNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fromTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{toTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qrcodeUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{data,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
